Here's SunSport's combined XI from Premier League players who have endured poor seasons this time around
We've done our Team of the Season minus Liverpool and Manchester City, but now it's time for the flops...

Right-wing: Christian Atsu

In a mediocre season for Newcastle, Atsu showed exactly why Chelsea let him go out on loan five times before selling him to the Magpies in 2017.
From 28 games, he managed one goal and zero assists - not exactly clinical.
In fact he managed 14 shots on target this season and 13 offsides. Atsu just pipped fellow winger Kenedy to a spot in the side while Willian was also in the frame.

曼聯中場桑馬達今個夏天回復自由身，多間西甲同英超球會都準備斟介，英國《太陽報》爆料，紐卡素領隊賓尼迪斯亦加入戰團，佢哋兩個喺2012/13球季曾經喺車路士合作過，「肥賓」認為桑馬達嘅創造力同經驗正正係紐卡素所需，所以決定出招。

不過，賓尼迪斯目前亦都同紐卡素就去留進行談判，而其中一個關鍵因素，就係球會限制簽入老將嘅規例，賓尼迪斯要求紐卡素畀佢引入老將以增強球隊實力，如果紐卡素真係成功簽31歲嘅桑馬達，就證明賓尼迪斯贏出呢場權力之戰。

#nufc have confirmed some talks with Shaikh Khaled. But say there is still "some way" to go on a deal. More to follow.

#nufc refusing to make any further comment at this time.

【Now Sports-體育】紐卡素班主艾珠利已經跟來自阿聯酋的超級富豪迪達成賣盤協議，而後者正正是曼城班主的表親。

根據英國《太陽報》報道，擁有紐卡素長達12年的艾殊利（Mike Ashley）已經跟以杜拜為基地的卡哈列特（Sheikh Khaled）簽下合約，以3.5億鎊把這支東北部英超球會出售。

卡哈列特為曼城班主蒙蘇的表親，屬於阿布扎比皇室的資深成員。雖然他的財力不及蒙蘇，但也擁有天文數字的身家，去年曾開價20億鎊希望收購另一英超球會利物浦，可惜未能成功。

艾殊利入主紐卡素後，由於不肯開水喉協助球隊擴軍，因而被喜鵲球迷的眼中針。若今次易手成事，紐迷會非常高興，而且有機會成為繼藍月、車路士之後，利用油王資金彈起的英超球隊。

相信卡哈列特入主的首個任務，是跟領隊賓尼迪斯續約。肥賓遲遲未肯簽下新合約，主要因為艾殊利不肯給予他充足的資金去簽新兵；進入卡哈列特時代後，情況似乎有180度轉變。

Kylian Mbappe is arguably the most sought after footballer on the planet this summer and fans took to social media to joke about Newcastle signing the PSG superstar, who signed for les Parisiens for £121.5milliion from Monaco.

And a lot of fans have even taken it one step further and placed bets on Mbappe - who hinted he may leave PSG this summer - to make the move to Tyneside.

There has been such a flurry, 64 per cent of bets in the last 24 hours backing the switch, that Oddschecker have confirmed Newcastle have been moved in to being the 25/1 second favourites to sign the 20-year-old.

Three hundred Newcastle fans will be in the money if the multi-million pound Abu Dhabi takeover of the club goes ahead and leads to silverware next year.

Betfred have slashed the odds from 1,000/1 to 250/1 on the Magpies winning the Premier League title in 2020 after it was revealed at the weekend that talks are ongoing between representatives of Shiekh Khalid bin Zayad Al Nehayan and club owner Mike Ashley.


The intense speculation that oil money could be heading to Tyneside has led to at least 300 fans – mainly in the North East but nationwide too – placing small speculative bets of £1, £5 and £10 on Rafa Benitez splashing out on strengthening the team enough during the next two transfer windows – and beating the top six to title glory.

Shola Ameobi to Join Newcastle in Loan Coordinator Role
